resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106792</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106792</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The student pathfinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Kursteilnehmerpfadfinder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'orienteur d'étudiant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O descobridor do estudante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'esploratore dell'allievo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ανιχνευτής σπουδαστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El pionero del estudiante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">By creating pathfinders, students not only learn to manage time and produce a higher quality research project, but they also develop 21st century learning skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Indem sie Pfadfinder herstellen, erlernen 
Kursteilnehmer nicht nur, Zeit zu handhaben und ein hochwertigeres 
Forschung Projekt zu produzieren, aber sie entwickeln auch 
erlernenfähigkeiten des 21. Jahrhunderts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En créant des orienteurs, les étudiants 
apprennent non seulement à contrôler le temps et à produire un 
projet de recherche plus de haute qualité, mais ils développent 
également des qualifications d'étude du 21ème siècle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Criando descobridores, os estudantes não somente 
para aprender controlar o tempo e produzir um projeto de pesquisa mais
de alta qualidade, mas desenvolvem também habilidades de aprendizagem
do século XXI.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Creando gli esploratori, gli allievi non soltanto 
per imparare gestire il tempo e produrre un progetto di ricerca più 
di alta qualità, ma egualmente sviluppano le abilità imparanti di 
ventunesimo secolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με τη δημιουργία των ανιχνευτών, σπουδαστές όχι μόνο 
μάθετε να διαχειρίζεστε το χρόνο και να παράγετε ένα υψηλότερο 
ποιοτικό ερευνητικό πρόγραμμα, αλλά αναπτύσσουν επίσης τις 
δεξιότητες εκμάθησης του 21$ου αιώνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Creando pioneros, los estudiantes no sólo para 
aprender manejar tiempo y producir un proyecto de investigación más 
de alta calidad, sino ellos también desarrollan habilidades que 
aprenden del siglo XXI.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MELISSA THIBAULT
FN:MELISSA THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106792</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/the-student-pathfinder</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
